physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Furniture, Food, Jewelry; Front Left to Right: Bill Rosen, Joseph Chappell, Don Neidess [Nidess], Ed Hyatt, Chairman Food Div, Alan Markson, Chairman Furniture Div, Morris Stein, Hon. Chair., [illegible]; Standing L. to R. Storen [Fred Storin], Bill Stein, [illegible title], Larry Kirsch, Don Fasen [crossed out and replaced with Felse], Becker, Dan Lustig, Joe Rosen.''

mods.abstract: Members of the Allied Jewish Federation Furniture, Food, and Jewelry Trades Division pose together. Front row left to right Bill Rosen, Joseph Chappell, Don Nidess, Ed Hyatt - Chairman Food Division, Alan Markson - Chairman Furniture Division, Morris Stein - Hon. Chair. and standing back row left to right Fred Storin, Bill Stein, Larry Kirsch, Don Felse, Becker, Dan Lustig, and Joe Rosen.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
